column4: Im having a bit of a problem here dumping the audio from a .flv file to a .mp3 file any one willing to help?
what tools are u using?
i have the mp3 file but jesus christ its like 22 mins long @ 2.5 megs :(
right and how did u get it out of flv? what tool did u use?
mplayer i used "mplayer -dumpaudio filehere.flv
oh ok do u have lame installed?
lame? dont think so
will that fix the problem?
it just might
lame is an mp3 encoder
sorta :)
actually i do have lame installed
oh ok well, may i suggest ffmpeg
tried that also lol XD
yea ffmpeg is crippled by default in ubuntu
or did u install the one from medibuntu repo?
i used ermm Syinapatic manager
right ok so u most likely have the cutoff version of it without mp3 support
here follow the guide on adding medibuntu repo https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Medibuntu
you know what ill do that right now with audacity
Usser: thx for all the help man
np
